General.Name: Zhuhai Bojay Electronics Co Ltd
General.Description: Zhuhai Bojay Electronics Co. Ltd engages in the research and development, production, and sale of industrial automation equipment and accessories in China and internationally. The company offers automation, RF test, acoustic test, electrical and optical test, functional test, and vision test solutions; and related technical services. Its products are used in electronic product performance testing and product assembly in consumer electronics, automotive electronics, medical electronics, industrial electronics, and other industries. The company was founded in 2005 and is headquartered in Zhuhai, China.
